scripts.setup-aapt: echo 'ðŸ”§ Setting up AAPT...' && mkdir -p tools && cd tools && (test -d cmdline-tools || (echo 'ðŸ“¥ Downloading Android SDK...' && curl -L 'https://dl.google.com/android/repository/commandlinetools-mac-11076708_latest.zip' -o android-cmdline-tools.zip && unzip -q android-cmdline-tools.zip && rm android-cmdline-tools.zip)) && echo 'ðŸ”¨ Installing build-tools (auto-accepting licenses)...' && yes | ./cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --sdk_root=./sdk 'build-tools;34.0.0' && echo 'âœ… AAPT ready!' && ./sdk/build-tools/34.0.0/aapt version
